properties.name: Cover
properties.description: [-] to ranged attacks targeting someone hiding behind it.

options.name: Cut your hand
options.description: -1d6 life: the basin hungers for more.

options.name: Feast of blood
options.description: -1d20 life: gain the *traits.bloodclad* trait.

options.name: Drink it all
options.description: +1d20 life, difficult END test or contract the [haemophilia] burden. The basin is depleted.

options.name: Drink a sip
options.description: +1d6 life. moderate CHA test or basin is depleted.

druidicbasrelief.name: Druidic bas-relief
druidicbasrelief.description: Shows emaciated figures in tribal clothing fighting technological horrors descending from the sky.

options.name: First success
options.description: Long ago, strange men in flying ships came to this world, bringing the sable oil that devours all things. The tribes of this world, skilled in the ways of living things, fought back. They matched their metal priests spell for spell. They bred great sea monsters that tore their ships from the heavens and smote their ruin upon the earth.

options.name: Second success
options.description: But it was not enough. Behind it all, the sable oil continued to sicken and devour the life of this world, and the power of the shamans waned. In a last desperate act, they sacrificed their lives in a great spell that replaced the soul within the sable oil with theirs.

options.name: Third success
options.description: Now the great shamans forever sleep. Should this world be threatened again, the oil will gather, the great beasts will rise, and the shamans will awaken from their slumber to do battle once more.

heavymetaldoor.name: Heavy Metal Door
heavymetaldoor.description: Imbued with oldtech, inscribed with images of guitar-wielding shamans of old.

options.name: Push the door open
options.description: Extreme STR test.

options.name: Play a shredding solo
options.description: Difficult CHA test, needs instrument and backup dancers.

options.name: Decipher oldtech unlock codes
options.description: Difficult THO test, needs relevant skill.

humanoidstatues.name: Humanoid Statues
humanoidstatues.description: Made of concrete-like material, frozen in unnerving poses.

options.name: First success
options.description: They are all in poses of fear and disgust.

options.name: Second success
options.description: They were not crafted by sentient hands.

options.name: Chip slightly
options.description: Traces of organic material within.

options.name: Crack open
options.description: Mummified human flesh and bones inside.

foolsgold.name: Fool's Gold
foolsgold.description: Veins of aurous metal, glittering with the follies of the long-dead.

options.name: Mine from a vein
options.description: Average STR test to retrieve, then difficult AUR test to avoid obsessing over the gold.

options.name: Forge into charm
options.description: Adds the *modifiers.foolishglimmer* modifier.

options.name: Forge into ward
options.description: Adds the *modifiers.foolishaura* modifier.

options.name: Add to meal
options.description: Adds the *modifiers.foolsluck* modifier.

microbiomebubble.name: Microbiome Bubble
microbiomebubble.flavor: A small gelatinous sphere floats in the waves. Tiny plants and creatures swirl within.
microbiomebubble.description: A tiny ecosystem contained in a gelatinous, self-sustaining bubble. It looks like you could add or take something from this balanced system.

options.name: Add some Supplies
options.description: -1d3 supply.

options.name: Add some Blood
options.description: -1d6 life.

options.name: Take a Sample
options.description: Easy AGI or THO test: gain 1 knowledge.

options.name: Take it All
options.description: +1d3 disruption.

sableoil.name: Sable Oil
sableoil.description: Self-replicating liquid nanites left over from a failed attempt to colonize the planet. A group of druidic eco-hackers rewrote the nanites' composite crowdcode to defend the planet's ecosystem rather than consume it.

options.name: Hack its behavior module
options.description: Difficult THO test.

options.name: Ask nicely
options.description: Moderate CHA test.

options.name: Forge
options.description: Forge: give an item *modifiers.selfrepairing*.

options.name: Blood Synthesis
options.description: The Oil eagerly attaches itself to the iron in your blood. Gain [+] to incoming healing for a session.
